ZLib (BCB)

Download

  • Download http://www.zlib.net/zlib-1.2.3.tar.gz

Project

  • Create new project (Library)
  • Add (%SOURCE_HOME%/): All .c files except example.c and minigzip.c

Project Options

  • Compiler : Release
  • C++, Exception handling : Disable all
  • Directories, Conditional : WIN32;_WIN32

Compile

  • Ctrl+F9

Install

  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/zlib.h to Shared/Include/ZLib/zlib.h
  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/zconf.h to Shared/Include/ZLib/zconf.h
  • Copy %Your_Project_Name%.lib to Shared/Library/BCB/ZLib.lib
